text: Brought my teenaged son to see Dr Huang because of his stomach ailments. He was ill for a week. Totally weakened by his vomiting and diarrhoea.  After taking tcm prescription  for 2 days, he was back to his normal self and was up and about.Dr Huang is veey patient and encouraging.

Dr Hwang is very patient and understanding and understands my concerns for my special needs child. His assistant Sofia helped me to translate my concerns into mandarin as well. Will definitely recommend his services to other parents who want to try more natural remedies.

I have been seeing physician Huang since he was a consultant for Euyansang. He is patient and give good health advices. My whole family has been seeing him for the past 10 over years bcoz his diagnosis is accurate and most importantly his prescription works for us.

It‚Äôs good to see him starting his own practice and I hope he can continue to serve the community bcoz it‚Äôs rather hard to find someone who is non-commercialized, high morals and genuinely care for his patients. Thumbs up to him!

Had a very bad lower back pain for weeks , decided to visit Xing Chin for acupuncture and tui Nah. Surprisingly pain subsided after 2 days and all back to normal within a week.
